title: Microsoft Teams Real Time Media Manager Integer Underflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Microsoft Teams. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the real time media manager. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in an integer underflow before writing to memory. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.
addtionnal_details: Microsoft has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-53783
timeline:
2025-04-16 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-08-14 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-08-14 - Advisory Updated
